dct_title_s: Southern Cameroons tribal areas and population density, 1926
dct_description_sm: Shapefile representing tribal areas in Southern Cameroons for 1926. Boundaries were extracted from a scanned British Colonial Office map. Polygons were then given attributes specifying the name and population density of each tribal area.
dct_creator_sm: Map and Geospatial Information Center, Lewis Library, Princeton University
